bibl.title: Corrections to the Critical Reading of the Gospel of Thomas.
bibl.note: Critical notes: 1. P. Oxy. I, 1 (= van Haelst 594), 24; - 2. P. Oxy. IV, 654 (= van Haelst 593), 8-9; - 3. P. Oxy. IV, 654, 9; - 4. P. Oxy. IV, 654, 15; - 5. P. Oxy. IV, 654, 25; - 6. P. Oxy. IV, 654, 26-27; - 7. Nag Hammadi Codex II, 2, 39, 34 (Coptic).
